wegayenma apa laba ganime warthawata mulin himikam kiwe parlimenthu mantha්ri hirunika pe්ramachandra wuwath ema warthawa mathakadi hitapu rajya amathini wijayakala maheshwaran wisin bida dama athi bawa piwithuru hela urumaya pawasayi.

kanse ha ti.aar.wi.murthi buduradun tharkika padanamaka pihita sitimin me prashna niwanata adala nowana nisa eewata nishchitha pilithurak nodun bawata adahas dakwuha.apa buduradun wishwaye kelawara gana asu ema awyakatha prashnawalata pilithuru nodunne eki ugathun dakwu adahas nisa nowa budun wahanse sabawinma lokaya pilibanda manawa dutu nisath eyata dena pilithura ema prashnaya asu pudgalaya thawath awulakata patalawena nisath, ek athakin eya niwanata adala nowana nisath, ‘sakkaya’ dittiyen yuthu pudgalayan me prashnawalata pilithuru wimasanne ya ema sakkaya dittiyata bandunu nisath bawa buduradun pahadili kara atha.
eya ekthara durakata niwaradiya.aluth gathi sirith, aluth parisarawal saha aluth mithuran labena wita apage atham parani purudu iwath wi yayi.eheth mehidi pawasiya yuthu itha wadagath deyak atha.
ewita, eya swabhawikawama nawatha niyama pathayata watiya yuthuyi. 2013 pamana sita eya sidu wuna.
in pasu owun kali maniyan wenuwen kowilak sadawa wanda sthrin suwapath karannata patan gena atha.
meka sundara nawakathawak wunanan purupuruta widushawa kawadawath munagahenne na.
tika welawakata pasu agamathi ranil wikramasinha, janadhipathi maithripala sirisena athulu wishesha amuththan pirisak da wena wenama paminiyaha.
ada wruththiya samithiyak kiyanne mokakda?
